item.title: Slender
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:40, topic:450816”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=553697.msg4079449#msg4079449 date=1345222958]
Finally got around to playing this. Not scarey at all honestly, I am disappointed. Usually when a game receives good hype, it tends to overshadow the game-play you got; rather from the game-play hype led you to believe it was going to be.

Is Penumbra scarey?
[/quote]

When you read through a thread describing every point in the game before you play, obviously it isn’t going to scare you…[/quote]

I watched video’s of it and ended up playing it and still got scared enough to just ESC out at 2 pages because I didn’t want to shit myself

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I played that game, didn’t get scared. Got pissed. Mother Fucking Slender Won’t let Me Do SHIT!
Tip: go into the bathroom first thing. Fucker always gets you there otherwise.

item.title: Slender
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:34, topic:450816”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=553697.msg4062776#msg4062776 date=1343578871]
Has anyone had him teleport in front of you right where you are looking? Ill upload the video, shit scared me and all of my friends lol.
[/quote]

Yeah, it happened in the tunnel to my sister when she played lol.

When my friend started playing, he heard the static, and he’s like, “Well I know there’s a waterfall…now I just have to find it.”[/quote]

hahaha. nice

Read full topic

item.title: Slender

item.title: Slender
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:28, topic:450816”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=553697.msg4062360#msg4062360 date=1343527317]
This is NOTHING compared to a creeper sneaking up on you in Minecraft.
[/quote]This game is a creeper an enderman, wes craven and a pedophile mixed together.[/quote]

Slenderman
Enderman
See the resemblance? Take out the ‘sl’ from ‘slenderman’ and you get ‘enderman’, and they both look similar. 7 feet tall and all black, creeps up out of nowhere and fucks your shit up.

Read full topic

item.title: Slender
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I’ve watched those shitty screamers.
I’ve played that stupid “The Grudge” game.
Creepypastas are week shit.
But this fucking game, holy shit. Me and a few friends were hanging out yesterday and today, and we decided to watch all the MarbleHornets entries before playing, and I went pretty quickly through the game up until He comes right up fucking on you. We all screamed like little bitches, and it was hilarious. 5/5, wouldn’t play again.

Read full topic

ugh this maps too big

id buy this game again every year[/quote]
